description: Starting with a terrible situation. Opposite of "Tian hu kai ju" (Perfect start).

examples.chinese: 天崩开局的一次旅行,下飞机行李箱被人拿错了
examples.translation: A trip with a disastrous start, suitcase taken by mistake after getting off the plane

examples.chinese: 今年工作第一天,发生交通事故住院,天崩开局
examples.translation: First day of work this year, hospitalized due to car accident, disastrous start

examples.chinese: 天崩开局,刚上的火车,车动了,邻座小孩把一杯可乐全洒我腿上了
examples.translation: Disastrous start, just got on the train, it moved, and the kid next to me spilled coke all over my legs
